analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol:
	Contract ZiberToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol#157-158)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ZiberToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol#93)
ZiberToken.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol#91-92)
ZiberToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol#92-93)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xdf83249f0f5c9926f1ee4310caa4e01c2f8abb89.sol:
